map-vis-filter-tags
directive in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Displays filter tags on top of the map visualization and supports removal of selections from the filter.

Usage

as element:
<map-vis-filter-tags
       map-vis-filter="{Array}">
</map-vis-filter-tags>

Directive info

  • This directive creates new scope.

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
map-vis-filterArray

Two way binding to an array containing the species/phenophase/year selections.
